document_data.caption: A map of the Grass Sea and surrounding area, ''circa'' [[1480 DR]]
document_data.name: Grass Sea
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grass Sea''' was a stretch of grassy plains found in the area of the [[Moonsea]] on the northern side of the [[Moonsea (lake)|sea]].<ref name=AL.PoRR-p12">{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|12}}<ref name=AL.PoRR-p33">{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|33}}
document_data.Description:
As its named suggested, the Grass Sea was a great, flat expanse of tall grasses with few landmark, save for a few ruined stone structures.<ref name=AL.PoRR-p12" /> 

To its west was the Giant's Cairn, a great open field dotted with [[giant]]-sized grave mounds, each of which was marked with an enormous boulder.<ref name=AL.PoRR-p10">{{Cite adventurers league/Pool of Radiance Resurgent|10}}

Geography.Geographical Features: There were few trees or shrubbery that grew within.<ref name=AL.PoRR-p12" />
Geography.Flora & Fauna: Herds of [[bison]] were known to make pasture in the grasses of the region, and [[bulette]]s dug in the earth beneath them.<ref name=AL.PoRR-p12" />

document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Lone Tower]], a solitary [[granite]] tower that was built to protect the Moonsea from the dangers of [[Thar]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The [[bandit]] gang known as the [[Gray Patriots]] had a number of criminal hideouts at various, hidden sites across the Grass Sea.<ref name=AL.OIR-p20">{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|20}}
